sub_fields.label: Disable Overlay?
sub_fields.name: disable_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Check this to remove the dark overlay

sub_fields.label: Custom Text Colour
sub_fields.name: custom_text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: The colour most of your text will appear

sub_fields.label: Custom Background Alt Colour
sub_fields.name: custom_background_colour_alt
sub_fields.instructions: An alternative to your custom background colour (should work well with your custom text colour)

sub_fields.label: Custom Accent Colour
sub_fields.name: custom_accent_colour
sub_fields.instructions: A colour you would use for emphasis

sub_fields.label: Custom Accent Reverse Colour
sub_fields.name: custom_accent_reverse_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Text colour that would show in front of an accent colour background (e.g. on buttons)

fields.label: Content
fields.name: content
fields.default_value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

sub_fields.label: Video Notice
sub_fields.message: Videos will only autoplay on desktop devices. The user will be given controls to play media on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Poster Image
sub_fields.name: poster_image
sub_fields.instructions: Where videos are not supported this image will be used. If no image is supplied, the default video thumbnail will be used.

choices.default: Default (Use the recommended aspect for this block)

sub_fields.label: Information
sub_fields.message: These settings allow you to change the image aspect ratios and fit (where supported).

sub_fields.label: Custom Image Sizing
sub_fields.name: custom_repeater_sizing
sub_fields.message: Allow each image size to be changed
